title: Getting Started with Pakistan Exports: A Practical Guide for New Exporters
excerpt: Learn the essentials of starting an export business from Pakistan, including documentation, market selection, and finding reliable buyers.
content: Pakistan has a strong export potential across agriculture, textiles, leather goods, sports equipment, and surgical instruments. This guide walks you through the key steps to start exporting: understanding HS codes, setting up your company profile, preparing compliance documents, choosing the right logistics partners, and leveraging platforms like Pak-Exporters to reach verified buyers.\n\nWe also cover common pitfalls new exporters face and how to build long-term relationships with international buyers.
author: Pak-Exporters Editorial Team

title: How to Choose Verified Suppliers on Pak-Exporters
excerpt: Understand our supplier verification process, membership tiers, and how to evaluate exporters for long-term partnerships.
content: Choosing the right supplier is critical for successful importing. On Pak-Exporters, suppliers go through a structured verification process, including business documentation checks, on-ground verification where applicable, and continuous performance monitoring.\n\nIn this article, we explain how to read supplier profiles, what our Platinum, Gold, Silver, and Starter tiers mean, and which metrics matter most when shortlisting suppliers.
author: Pak-Exporters Editorial Team
